entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
